Class ChatThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • ChatThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    public class ChatThread
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    ChatThread is a public class that implements the interface runnable. The class is used to handle chats between two different students.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ChatThread

        public ChatThread​(UniversityStudent sender,
                  UniversityStudent receiver,
                  java.lang.String message)
        Parameters:
        sender - is the student sending the message
        receiver - is the student receiving the message sent by the sender.
        message - is the contents of the message that sender wants to send to reciever. The method will handle the sending and recieving of messages using threads.
